post.body: early morning hustling! i hope yo boss FIRES u today and u understand the importance of getting ur very on hustle! So Southern @ Amazon.com
THE TEXT WROTE HERE ON TWITTER ARE FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES ONLY AND DOES NOT IMPLICATE ANYONE IN ANY FASHION, SHOULD NOT BE TAKEN LITERAL
I pray that Jesus Christ understands why i must hustle in the streets and shoot burners at niggas. sick of hustling various drugs.sosouthern

only in America can a man get rich from dopesells and album sells, and tweet about it! what a country! DOWNLOAD SO SOUTHERN @ Rhapsody.com
does street cred matter in hiphop? shak stewart told me YES, then he killed himself...meanwhile i sold more birds!:( download so southernNOW
i down in tha souf with gold mouf goons who HATE twitter!good thing my street cred intact, cant say the same for u other herbs.copsosouthern
at the airport smuggling mass green. are those bomb dogs, or drug dogs?! thats why i'm a stack up and get a PJ :) sosouthern @ amazon.com
airport is nuts...trying to smuggle massive weed thru right now. u think air control get these messages? hope not! Download SO SOUTHERN NOW!
niggas can stay in newyorkcity if they like. I'm flyin to atl, back to dc, back to texas, back to new york! and i jus hustle! cop sosouthern
real talk i fucks wit bush, he let niggas make hella cake in tha dope game. hopefully obama wont legalize it and kill my biz.cop sosouthern
bush is ducking and dodging shots like the matrix in the trap. tha goons look mystified... i told u niggas i was comin. download so southern
this nigga bush dives in with tha chopper with tha shoulder strap and shit... commando rolls thru the trap and shit.LOL. download sosouthern
who knew this nigga Bush had cat like reflexes... i need him wit me next time I kick a doe! get tha dope and money up NOW! cop so southern
jus seen Bush get the shoe thrown at him. I swear if a nigga try me like that i'm shooting him down! Bush u deserved to have that shoe hit u
its funny when they think i'm jus a dboy and they hear my single... never seen a female fuck quicker... DOWNLOAD SO SOUTHERN @ RHAPSODY.COM
2 out of 3 women will fuck a rich D boy... at the end of the day they jus want u to buy waffle house waffles for them. i kno!cop sosouthern!
i'll admit it, ive sold niggas bullshit, hell even shit that wasnt shit at all... theres no integrity in the streets! DOWNLOAD SO SOUTHERN..
how will the rap game act when i'm shooting niggas at the awards shows over bad dope transactions?tell me that! save my life cop so southern
big shout out to ALL my syrup sippers. sippin is cool but its cooler to sell it!tell me if u need it like d.king...Download SO SOUTHERN NOW!
early gettin that trap money. Da Chicken Shack is officially open for biz! Stop hating me cause i'm so real! download so southern @ amazon
hustled dope all day today people, is it me or do the most unlikely niggas carry guns... I carry my own shit! Download SO SOUTHERN @ ITUNES!
they hate real muthafuckas according to katt williams... that boy katt kno he is an American Hustler like myself. COP so southern @Amazon
lastly, JESSE killin someone is not an idle threat i have tha guns and goons to really do it. beware niggas! So Southern @ ITunesMusicStore

also i kno how to cook crack, manufacture crystal meth, mix syrup, measure all forms of dope, and shoot off burners. Download SOSOUTHERN now

tonight I'm in tha dirty souf and I got to perform. shows make me wanna rap full time and never sell dope again:( ah well. COP SO SOUTHERN!
furthermore drug traffickers would NEVER be COs. We HATE them! tha game loves a bullshitter. Cop So SOuthern before I do physical harm to u

jesse tweets about his hustling of illegal substances, making it hot for his drug fam, while ross was a CO. My album is out too So Southern
I'm officially the REALEST nigga on twitter considering I incriminate myself with every tweet! smoking/sellin kush right now! copsosouthern!
Also sellig dope for a livin is NOT glamorous... I do what I must to survive in America. Closer to that millie than ever tho. copsosouthern!
I wish I was "jus a twitter trapper". SHout out to ALL tha J's who support my Heavyweight cuz its FIRE! 4 u squares Download so southern NOW
